tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_behavior_analysis (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_count INT,
    last_interaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PostingSchedule (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserBehaviorPatterns(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_behavior (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
    behavior_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    content_id INT,
    content_category VARCHAR(50)
) 

CREATE TABLE content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    publish_date DATE,
    views_count INT
) 

CREATE TABLE posting_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_day VARCHAR(20),
    schedule_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PostingAnalytics (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    total_views INT,
    total_likes INT,
    total_shares INT
);
